Name: PvZ2_Prepreprelease_DA_P2

Updates.en: Added Wizard Zombie, Master Enchanter Zombie(Wizard Veteran), King Zombie, King Veteran. King Veteran supplies helmets even for non-peasant zombies
Updates.zh: 加入巫师僵尸、国王僵尸及其拓展变种，拓展国王僵尸不仅限于能为黑暗时代普通僵尸戴上盔甲

Updates.en: Added Dark Ages Dangerroom(Veteran as well)
Updates.zh: 加入黑暗时代无尽模式（包括拓展部分）

Updates.en: Skyshooters now slightly knock back zombies without making them blow-able for Blovers like Primal Peashooter
Updates.zh: 飞天豌豆会对僵尸造成轻微击退，但不会像原始豌豆那样让僵尸能被三叶草吹飞

NewFeatures: 加入巫师僵尸、国王僵尸及其拓展变种，拓展国王僵尸不仅限于能为黑暗时代普通僵尸戴上盔甲
加入黑暗时代无尽模式（包括拓展部分）
飞天豌豆会对僵尸造成轻微击退，但不会像原始豌豆那样让僵尸能被三叶草吹飞
EnNewFeatures: Added Wizard Zombie, Master Enchanter Zombie(Wizard Veteran), King Zombie, King Veteran. King Veteran supplies helmets even for non-peasant zombies
Added Dark Ages Dangerroom(Veteran as well)
Skyshooters now slightly knock back zombies without making them fly like Primal Peashooter
